item.description: Latest news stories from Tasmania including wind and renewable energy, wild weather, logging and forestry news, crime and TAS political news

item.title: Australia experiences massive 50-degree difference in first week of summer
item.description: <p>P﻿arts of Australia experienced sub-zero temperatures, whilst other soared to above 40 degrees.</p>

item.title: 9News - Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world
item.description: Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world

item.title: Politics News - 9News - Latest political news today Australia and World
item.description: Latest political news from Australia and around the world, covering elections, by-elections, our regular leadership spills, poll results, Question Time debates and daily Australian party politics

item.title: Social media news headlines - 9News
item.description: Latest social media news from Facebook, Twitter, and other social networks, viral news stories, and other online social news

item.title: Brisbane council moves to ban short-term rentals from residential suburbs
item.description: <p>Homeowners in Brisbane&#x27;s low-density suburbs will effectively be banned from operating short-term rentals, such as AirBnb, under new council reforms.</p>

item.title: 'Fierce blaze' breaks out at petrol station in Sydney's south-west
item.description: <p>Hamilton Road is closed in all directions as firefighters battle the blaze from every direction.</p>

item.title: New images show an interstellar comet that will soon make its closest approach to Earth
item.description: <p>Comet 3I/ATLAS will come within 270 million kilometres of Earth on December 19.</p>

item.title: RBA spares cash-strapped households as rates kept on hold
item.description: <p>Financial markets widely anticipated rates to be on hold, with just a 10 per cent chance priced in of the RBA unexpectedly raising the cash rate target.</p>

item.title: Third boy charged with murder following fatal stabbing of Lucas Cornu in Sydney's north-west
item.description: <p>17-year-old Lucas Cornu was stabbed in the leg at Bruce Purser Reserve on Caballo Street, on the border of Rouse Hill and Beaumont Hills, last month.</p>

item.title: Bodies of two women discovered inside home in Melbourne's north-east
item.description: <p>Emergency services were called to a property on Houghton Place in Rosanna about 11.20am today to conduct a welfare check.</p>

item.title: 'Beautiful natured boy': Tributes for electric motorbike rider, 14, killed in crash with 4WD
item.description: <p>Emergency services were called to Chute Street in Diamond Creek at about 10pm yesterday, where they found an electric motorcycle and a 4WD had crashed.</p>

item.title: Australian National Weather Forecast
item.description: National weather forecast for Australia including capital city temperatures, rain radar maps, satellite images, synoptic chart, and weather warnings
